New Records: USA won the Super Over against Pakistan in the ICC Men's T20 World Cup
Key Match Events: Monank Patel made a match-winning 50 off 38 balls
Saurabh Netravalkar took 2 for 18 in his four overs
Nosthush Kenjige took 3 for 30 in his four overs
Pakistan's Mohammad Amir bowled three wides in the Super Over
Post-Match Reflections: Babar Azam admitted Pakistan were 'not up to the mark' in bowling
USA's win was a significant morale booster ahead of the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: USA outclass sloppy Pakistan in thrilling Super Over finish
USA's measured batting performance gave no sense of being a bolt from the blue
Others: USA's Super Over smash and grab
Pakistan's most experienced bowler, Mohammad Amir, bowled three wides in his Super Over
